title: Phase 6: Real AI Chat Integration
description:
Replace mock AI responses with real Claude CLI streaming.

## Focus: Claude with Agent/Skill/MCP Config

### Core Integration
- Port lib/ai/claude.ts from personal-homepage
- SSE API route for streaming
- --resume for multi-turn conversations per task

### Per-Task Configuration (key feature!)
- **Agent selection**: --agent flag (from ~/.claude/agents/)
- **Skills**: trigger skills via prompt patterns
- **MCP servers**: --add-dir, tool permissions
- **Permission mode**: bypassPermissions, plan, etc.

### Task Settings UI
Update TaskModal settings to configure:
- Agent dropdown (list from ~/.claude/agents/)
- Working directory (--add-dir)
- Permission mode toggle
- Allowed/disallowed tools

### Reference
- ~/projects/personal-homepage/lib/ai/claude.ts
- ~/projects/personal-homepage/docs/ai-workspace-patterns.md

### CLI Flags
\`\`\`bash
claude --print \\
  --output-format=stream-json \\
  --resume <session-id> \\
  --agent <agent-name> \\
  --add-dir /path/to/project \\
  --permission-mode bypassPermissions
\`\`\`
close_reason: Phase 6 complete: Real Claude CLI streaming, per-task settings, agent/skill/permission config
